article_title: In The Tank Podcast (ep14): Best of In The Tank Thus Far…
article_text:
Because of the extended holiday weekend, today’s edition of the In The Tank Podcast will be a best-of edition. What follows is an assortment of Hosts Donny Kendal and John Nothdurft’s best moments of the first several episodes.

Included in this best-of episode, Donny and John invite Jim Lakely to discuss some of the worst presidential campaign blunders in history, they speak with Emily Zanotti about mini-skirt bans. This episode also includes the segment about beer label regulations as well as the segment about presidential candidates with beards.

Donny and John will be back with a brand new edition of In The Tank next week. Have a happy Thanksgiving!

[Please subscribe to the Heartland Daily Podcast for free at this link.]
